title: Backend development
description: I started with backend development with Node.js in high school. It's one of my favorite disciplines in software development space.
I have experience in software testing, building REST APIs, writing (*well*) structured backend code, etc,..
I've developed quite a few backend apps for personal projects.

title: Web Development
description: Started making basic websites with HTML & CSS during the second year of high school.
Today I like to play around with my silly ideas and web visualizations.
I have had some professional experience, but most of the stuff I make for now is just for fun.

title: Mobile development
description: I made my first Android app in collaboration with my boi jakic12. We (somewhat) successfully build an app that displayed weekly meal menu and schedule for our school.

title: Film making
description: I was very passionate about film making back in primary school and at the beginning of high school. I professionally filmed a few weddings with my friend Tilen Miklavic and helped edited a movie that screened in our local theater.

title: Photography
description: I do photography mostly for fun in my free time or when I go on trips.
